name: Real Easy "Star Trek TNG " Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who is the Captain of the Enterprise D?
questions.explanation:
Picard.

	The Captain is Jean-Luc Picard.

Riker.

	His name is William T. Riker.  He has been offered commands of his own, but is hoping to one day get the Enterprise so he has turned them all down.

questions.text: Who is the doctor in all seasons except season 2?
questions.explanation:
Crusher.

	Dr. Beverly Crusher's late husband, Jack, and Captain Picard were very good friends.

questions.text: Who was the doctor in season 2?
questions.explanation:
Pulaski.

	Dr. Pulaski was there for season 2.  It took her a while to accept Data as a fellow officer and not just an android.

questions.text: Who was the first Chief of Security when the series began?
questions.explanation:
Yar.

	Tasha Yar was the first Chief of Security.  Lt. Worf replaced her when she passed away.

questions.text: Who was the second and final Chief of Security?
questions.explanation:
Worf.

	Worf got promoted to Lt. Commander in the movie "Generations".

questions.text: Who was the android Science Officer?
questions.explanation:
Data.

	Data had a brother Lore.  Lore had to be dismantled because he was evil.  Data had to be the one to do the dismantling.

Troi.

	Deanna Troi and Will Riker had had a relationship before the series began.  It was discussed on several occasions, however they remained very good friends.

questions.text: Who was the Chief of Engineering the last few seasons?
questions.explanation:
LaForge.

	Geordi LaForge was constantly turning impossible situations into ideas that worked.  Geordi's VISOR was actually a banana comb they had painted.

questions.text: Who was Dr. Crusher's son that was also an acting Ensign?
questions.explanation:
Wes.

	Wes left Starfleet to follow The Traveler.
